Work

Take a scroll through recent projects.

Savings by Vehicle tool

The Savings by Vehicle tool is a web app built to increase organic search growth as well as conversion. This tool dynamically builds hundreds of landing pages that are unique by vehicle make and model.

The tool allows visitors to look up savings based on a vehicles make and model. When a vehicles make and model is selected the tool builds the requested page on demand and serves it.

See it live here!

Outcome

By leveraging internal data and a modern tech stack, the Savings by Vehicle tool has saved the Marketing and Engineering teams hundreds of hours on labor.

Lift

  • Dynamically produced 300+ vehicle landing pages
  • Increased organic search by ~20% in the first 6 weeks
  • Created a tool and resource for users
  • 95% reduction in vehicle landing page development time

keep scrolling

Auto loan refinance calculator

When building a calculator tool it is easy to get caught up in formulas and lose sight of what really matters: Is it useful? Unless you are familiar with refinancing a car loan, the typical refinance calculator is overwhelming. The goal for this calculator was to make it simple, intuitive, and useful.

See the prototype here!

Outcome

The calculator was simplified by removing unnecessary inputs and utilizing the correct input types to ensure ease of use. Results are highlighted and displayed in a clear way.

Lift

  • Calculator accurate within $50
  • Simplified and more intuitive UI
  • Instant calculations on input change
